title: Bob the builder
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television programs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television programs for children
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
description: Join Bob the builder, his faithful cat Pilchard and his gang of building machines: Scoop the Digger, Muck the Bulldozer, Dizzy the Cement-mixer, Lofty the Crane and Roley the Steamroller in their world of fun, adventure, construction, muck and mayhem. Included on the tape are 4 exciting tales: 'Scoop saves the day'; Bob and his team are called on to save the day when the town is damaged by a heavy storm; 'Travis paints the town'; Spud the mischievous scarecrom plays a trick on Travis that nearly ends in disaster; 'Bob saves the hedgehogs'; even hedgehogs need to cross the road safely, so they enlist the help of Bob and his machinery; 'Pilchard in a pickle'; Pilchard the cat has gone missing. Where could she be? Is she in one of the pipes that Bob has carried off to lay? Written by Diane Redmond.
